about.title: About Me
about.firstDescription: üëãüèº Hi! I'm Yeison Andr√©s Molina Salcedo, a software developer with over 10 years of experience, specializing in Frontend and Mobile development with Full Stack and DevOps skills. I have worked in sectors such as education, logistics, mobility, and e-commerce, both nationally and internationally.
about.secondDescription: ‚úÖ My skills include advanced frontend technologies like Next.js, React, React Native, Redux, TypeScript, JavaScript, Material UI, SASS. I also have backend experience with Node.js, PHP, Ruby on Rails, Python, and databases like MySQL, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB.
about.thirdDescription: üöÄ I am an expert in agile methodologies like SCRUM and Kanban, and have led development teams, ensuring high-quality product delivery. My commitment to excellence is reflected in creating efficient and optimized code, ensuring its quality with unit tests and DevOps tools.
